Summary Note:
Hernández Sánchez Navarro and the RM crossed paths at a tech conference in Madrid. They attended several keynote sessions together and realized they had a shared vision for the future of technology investments.
Hernández Sánchez Navarro is a seasoned professional with over 17 years of experience.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Hernández Sánchez Navarro and Emma have been married since 2020.
Education Background:
Hernández obtained his secondary school diploma from IES Luis Vives Zaragoza in 2003.
Hernández received his degree from University of Valencia in 1993.
Occupation History:
Hernández Sánchez Navarro is a 40 year old Partner from Spain. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Hernández Sánchez Navarro's first role was as a Associate Attorney at Uría Menéndez Abogados S.L.P., where he worked diligently from 2008 to 2012 to establish a strong reputation.
In 2014, he moved to Cuatrecasas Gonçalves Pereira S.L.P. to work as a Senior Associate, applying his knowledge to achieve outstanding performance.
From 2019 till now, he served as a Partner at Cuatrecasas Gonçalves Pereira S.L.P., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 130000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns townhouse in Santa Cruz de Tenerife, where he resides. It is worth 1050000 EUR.

He inherited 7720000 EUR from his grandfather, a well-known Real Estate Developer, in 2016, allowing him to expand his investment portfolio.
Client Summary: The RM knows the client very well and is a good friend of the entire family.
